comment._content: Is his belt buckle backwards *and* upsidedown?

comment.author: 35072786@N08
comment._content: artolog: Yes, the buckle is backwards. Ambrotypes and tintypes are often mirror images. Perhaps the soldier thought the buckle would display correctly if he flipped it. Here is a similar one: www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/5228555193/
